alert.note: Alert for Chambers (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 1:57AM CDT until March 26 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL CHAMBERS COUNTY... At 157 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over La Fayette, or near Lafayette, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, La Fayette, Lakeview, Amity Park, Fredonia, Veasey Creek Park, Denson, Buffalo, Rocky Point and Southern Harbor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
